title: Amazon Essentials Mens Long Sleeve Polo Shirt with Collar, Regular-Fit Pique
description: REGULAR FIT: Experience both style and comfort with this regular fit design in men's long sleeve polo shirts, providing ample room through shoulders, chest, and waist for daily wear
SOFT COTTON PIQUE: Enjoy the soft feel of pique polo shirt for men in 100% cotton, offering natural stretch and breathability
VERSATILE STYLE: Ideal for transitional weather, this 100% cotton polo shirts for men is great for layering under sweaters or wearing on its own for a refined look
DURABLE DETAILS: This golf shirt features flat knit rib trim at the collar and sleeve openings, a two-button placket, and a straight bottom hem with side vents
HIGH-QUALITY & AFFORDABLE: This mens polo shirt is crafted to be affordable and long-lasting

Crafted from 100% cotton pique, these polo shirts for men provide a soft hand feel with natural stretch. Ideal for any season, these long sleeve collared shirts for men are a nice blend of style and practicality. The flat knit rib trim at the collar and sleeve openings, combined with a two-button placket, add a refined touch. With a focus on dependable fit, these mens collared shirts deliver consistency and quality. The Amazon Essentials line caters to those looking for knit shirts for men or the classic knit polo men style.
